noun.description: An animal of the phylum or group Sipuncula (formerly Sipunculoidea or Sipunculoida), a peanut worm.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the phylum or group Sipuncula (formerly Sipunculoidea or Sipunculoida).

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Louis Agassiz (1807–1873), zoologist and geologist. From Sipunculus + -oid, after scientific Latin Sipunculoidea.
